name: Nauya, the Ogdoadic Remnant
desc: You can send this card from your hand to the GY; send 1 LIGHT Reptile monster from your Deck to the GY. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Ogdoadic" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Nauya, the Ogdoadic Remnant" once per turn.
